name: rev_app

text.english: Inductive case of rev: \[ \forall A, \forall l_1, l_2 \in L_A . rev(app (l_1, l_2)) = app (rev (l_2), rev (l_1)) \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo rev: \[ \forall A, \forall l_1, l_2 \in L_A . rev(app l1 l2) = app (rev l2) (rev l1) \]

coq:
Lemma rev_app:forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), rev(app l1 l2) = app (rev l2) (rev l1).
Proof.
Admitted.
